verses.text: \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Agrippa|strong="G0067"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w Thou|strong="G4671"\w* art \w permitted|strong="G2010"\w* to \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w*. \w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* stretched \w forth|strong="G1614"\w* the \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, and answered for \w himself|strong="G0626"\w*:

I \w think|strong="G2233"\w* \w myself|strong="G1683"\w* \w happy|strong="G3107"\w*, \w king|strong="G0935"\w* \w Agrippa|strong="G0067"\w*, because I \w shall|strong="G3195"\w* answer for \w myself|strong="G0626"\w* this \w day|strong="G4594"\w* \w before|strong="G1909"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w* \w touching|strong="G4012"\w* all the \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w whereof|strong="G3739"\w* I am \w accused|strong="G1458"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*:

\w Especially|strong="G3122"\w* \add because I know\add* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* to \w be|strong="G5607"\w* \w expert|strong="G1109"\w* in \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w customs|strong="G5037"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w questions|strong="G1352"\w* which \w are|strong="G2596"\w* \w among|strong="G2453"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G1485"\w*: \w wherefore|strong="G1189"\w* I \w beseech|strong="G4675"\w* \w thee|strong="G3116"\w* to \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w me|strong="G3450"\w* patiently.

\w My|strong="G3450"\w* manner of \w life|strong="G0981"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* my \w youth|strong="G3503"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w at|strong="G0575"\w* the \w first|strong="G0746"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* mine \w own|strong="G3450"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \w know|strong="G2467"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*;

Which \w knew|strong="G4267"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* from the \w beginning|strong="G0509"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* they \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w testify|strong="G3140"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the most \w straitest|strong="G0196"\w* \w sect|strong="G0139"\w* of \w our|strong="G2251"\w* \w religion|strong="G2356"\w* I \w lived|strong="G2198"\w* a \w Pharisee|strong="G5330"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* I \w stand|strong="G2476"\w* and am \w judged|strong="G2919"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* the \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* of the \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* our \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w*:

\w Unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \add promise\add* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* twelve \w tribes|strong="G1429"\w*, \w instantly|strong="G1616"\w* \w serving|strong="G3000"\w* \add God\add* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w*, \w hope|strong="G1679"\w* to \w come|strong="G2658"\w*. \w For|strong="G4012"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w hope’s sake|strong="G1680"\w*, \w king|strong="G0935"\w* \w Agrippa|strong="G0067"\w*, I am \w accused|strong="G1458"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*.

\w Why|strong="G5101"\w* should it be \w thought|strong="G2919"\w* a thing \w incredible|strong="G0571"\w* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w that|strong="G1487"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* should \w raise|strong="G1453"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*?

\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w verily|strong="G3767"\w* \w thought|strong="G1380"\w* with \w myself|strong="G1683"\w*, that I \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* to \w do|strong="G4238"\w* many \w things|strong="G4183"\w* \w contrary|strong="G1727"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* of \w Nazareth|strong="G3480"\w*.

Which \w thing|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G4160"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* of the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w* \w did|strong="G2623"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* shut \w up|strong="G2623"\w* in \w prison|strong="G5438"\w*, having \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w* \w from|strong="G3844"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w*; \w and|strong="G5037"\w* when \w they|strong="G0846"\w* were put to \w death|strong="G0337"\w*, I \w gave|strong="G2702"\w* my \w voice|strong="G5586"\w* \w against|strong="G2702"\w* \add them\add*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w punished|strong="G5097"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w oft|strong="G4178"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w*, and \w compelled|strong="G0315"\w* \add them\add* to \w blaspheme|strong="G0987"\w*; \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w being|strong="G1693"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="G4057"\w* \w mad|strong="G1693"\w* against \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, I \w persecuted|strong="G1377"\w* \add them\add* \w even|strong="G2193"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w strange|strong="G1854"\w* \w cities|strong="G4172"\w*.

\w Whereupon|strong="G3739"\w* \w as|strong="G2532"\w* I \w went|strong="G4198"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Damascus|strong="G1154"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w commission|strong="G2011"\w* \w from|strong="G3844"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w*,

\w At|strong="G2250"\w* \w midday|strong="G3319"\w*, O \w king|strong="G0935"\w*, I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w* a \w light|strong="G5457"\w* from \w heaven|strong="G3771"\w*, \w above|strong="G5228"\w* the \w brightness|strong="G2987"\w* of the \w sun|strong="G2246"\w*, shining round \w about|strong="G4034"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* which \w journeyed|strong="G4198"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when \w we|strong="G2257"\w* were \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w fallen|strong="G2667"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* a \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w speaking|strong="G2980"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* in the \w Hebrew|strong="G1446"\w* \w tongue|strong="G1258"\w*, \wj  \+w Saul|strong="G4549"\+w*, \+w Saul|strong="G4549"\+w*, \+w why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w persecutest|strong="G1377"\+w* \+w thou me|strong="G3165"\+w*? \+add it is\+add* \+w hard|strong="G4642"\+w* \+w for thee|strong="G4671"\+w* \+w to kick|strong="G2979"\+w* \+w against|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w the pricks|strong="G2759"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Who|strong="G5101"\w* art \w thou|strong="G1488"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*? \w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w Jesus|strong="G2424"\+w* \+w whom|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w thou|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w persecutest|strong="G1377"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w rise|strong="G0450"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w stand|strong="G2476"\+w* \+w upon|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w feet|strong="G4228"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w I have appeared|strong="G3700"\+w* \+w unto thee|strong="G4671"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w this purpose|strong="G5124"\+w*, \+w to make|strong="G4400"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4571"\+w* \+w a minister|strong="G5257"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w a witness|strong="G3144"\+w* \+w both|strong="G5037"\+w* \+w of these things which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w thou hast seen|strong="G1492"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G5037"\+w* \+w of those things in the which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w I will appear|strong="G3700"\+w* \+w unto thee|strong="G4671"\+w*;\wj*

\wj  \+w Delivering|strong="G1807"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4571"\+w* \+w from|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w the people|strong="G2992"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+add from\+add* \+w the Gentiles|strong="G1484"\+w*, \+w unto|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w whom|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w now|strong="G3568"\+w* \+w I send|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4571"\+w*,\wj*

\wj  \+w To open|strong="G0455"\+w* \+w their|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w eyes|strong="G3788"\+w*, \+add  \+w and|strong="G3588"\+w*\+add* \+w to turn|strong="G1994"\+w* \+add them\+add* \+w from|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w darkness|strong="G4655"\+w* \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w light|strong="G5457"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+add from\+add* \+w the power|strong="G1849"\+w* \+w of Satan|strong="G4567"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*, that \+w they|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w may receive|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w forgiveness|strong="G0859"\+w* \+w of sins|strong="G0266"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w inheritance|strong="G2819"\+w* \+w among|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w them which|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w are sanctified|strong="G0037"\+w* \+w by faith|strong="G4102"\+w* \+w that is in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1691"\+w*.\wj*

\w Whereupon|strong="G3606"\w*, O \w king|strong="G0935"\w* \w Agrippa|strong="G0067"\w*, I \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w disobedient|strong="G0545"\w* unto the \w heavenly|strong="G3770"\w* \w vision|strong="G3701"\w*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w shewed|strong="G0518"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w* unto \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w Damascus|strong="G1154"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w throughout|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w coasts|strong="G5561"\w* of \w Judæa|strong="G2449"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add then\add* to the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, that they should \w repent|strong="G3340"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w turn|strong="G1994"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, and \w do|strong="G4238"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w meet|strong="G0514"\w* for \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1752"\w* these \w causes|strong="G5130"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w caught|strong="G4815"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, and went \w about|strong="G3987"\w* to \w kill|strong="G1315"\w* \add me\add*.

\w Having|strong="G5177"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w obtained|strong="G5177"\w* \w help|strong="G1947"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, I \w continue|strong="G2476"\w* \w unto|strong="G0891"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w witnessing|strong="G3140"\w* \w both|strong="G5037"\w* to \w small|strong="G3398"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w none|strong="G3762"\w* other \w things|strong="G1622"\w* \w than|strong="G5037"\w* those \w which|strong="G3739"\w* the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* did \w say|strong="G2980"\w* \w should|strong="G3195"\w* \w come|strong="G1096"\w*:

\w That|strong="G1487"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w should|strong="G3195"\w* \w suffer|strong="G3805"\w*, \add and\add* \w that|strong="G1487"\w* he should be the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* that should \w rise|strong="G0386"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, and should \w shew|strong="G2605"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w* unto the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* as \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w thus|strong="G5023"\w* spake for \w himself|strong="G0626"\w*, \w Festus|strong="G5347"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w* with a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, thou art beside \w thyself|strong="G3105"\w*; \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w learning|strong="G1121"\w* doth \w make|strong="G4062"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* \w mad|strong="G3130"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G5346"\w*, I \w am|strong="G3105"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w mad|strong="G3105"\w*, most \w noble|strong="G2903"\w* \w Festus|strong="G5347"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* speak \w forth|strong="G0669"\w* the \w words|strong="G4487"\w* of \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w soberness|strong="G4997"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w king|strong="G0935"\w* \w knoweth|strong="G1987"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* these \w things|strong="G5130"\w*, \w before|strong="G4314"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* I \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w freely|strong="G3955"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* I am \w persuaded|strong="G3982"\w* that \w none|strong="G3762"\w* of these \w things|strong="G5130"\w* are hidden \w from|strong="G2990"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* this \w thing|strong="G5124"\w* \w was|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w done|strong="G4238"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w corner|strong="G1137"\w*.

\w King|strong="G0935"\w* \w Agrippa|strong="G0067"\w*, believest \w thou|strong="G4100"\w* the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*? I \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* thou \w believest|strong="G4100"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Agrippa|strong="G0067"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w Almost|strong="G3641"\w* thou \w persuadest|strong="G3982"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* to \w be|strong="G1096"\w* a \w Christian|strong="G5546"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, I \w would|strong="G2172"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w that|strong="G2172"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w thou|strong="G4571"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* that \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w me|strong="G3450"\w* this \w day|strong="G4594"\w*, \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w almost|strong="G3641"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w altogether|strong="G4183"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w as|strong="G3697"\w* \w I|strong="G2504"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w*, \w except|strong="G3924"\w* \w these|strong="G5130"\w* \w bonds|strong="G1199"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w had|strong="G2036"\w* \w thus|strong="G5023"\w* \w spoken|strong="G2036"\w*, the \w king|strong="G0935"\w* rose \w up|strong="G0450"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w governor|strong="G2232"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w Bernice|strong="G0959"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* that \w sat|strong="G4775"\w* with \w them|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they were gone \w aside|strong="G0402"\w*, they \w talked|strong="G2980"\w* \w between|strong="G4314"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0240"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w doeth|strong="G4238"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w* of \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* of \w bonds|strong="G1199"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w* \w Agrippa|strong="G0067"\w* unto \w Festus|strong="G5347"\w*, \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* might have \w been|strong="G1410"\w* set at \w liberty|strong="G0630"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* he \w had|strong="G1941"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w appealed|strong="G1941"\w* unto \w Cæsar|strong="G2541"\w*.
